title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 23
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 23
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Lennox International (LII). Lennox International Inc.'s shares have rallied to a record after third-quarter results were well received. Earnings and revenue at the maker of heating and cooling equipment together beat analysts' average estimates in a Bloomberg survey for the fifth straight quarter. Lennox came out ahead during the latest three-month period even though hurricanes that struck Texas and Florida hurt business.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
